PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoilOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Coil occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcCoil.

PropertyDef.Name: HasSoundAttenuation
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the coil has sound attenuation, FALSE if it does not.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: VRAI si la batterie possède une correction acoustique, FAUX si ce n'est pas le cas.
